abilities.name: Junkyard Titan
abilities.description: Innate: Rumble gains  Heat each time he uses a basic ability and loses 10  Heat per second after not using any abilities for 4 seconds. Rumble gains Danger Zone when at or above 50  Heat, and Overheated when at 100  Heat.
descriptions: Innate: Rumble gains  Heat each time he uses a basic ability and loses 10  Heat per second after not using any abilities for 4 seconds. Rumble gains Danger Zone when at or above 50  Heat, and Overheated when at 100  Heat.
Danger Zone: Rumble's basic abilities are enhanced.

Overheating: Rumble's abilities are disabled for 6 seconds. During this time, his basic attacks deal 25 − 110 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage to non- structures while his  Heat decays back to 0 over the duration.

abilities.name: Flamespitter
abilities.description: Active: Rumble activates his flamethrower for 3 seconds, gaining 20  Heat and dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of him, reduced against  minions.
descriptions: Active: Rumble activates his flamethrower for 3 seconds, gaining 20  Heat and dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of him, reduced against  minions.
Danger Zone: Flamespitter's damage is increased by 50%.

abilities.name: Scrap Shield
abilities.description: Active: Rumble  shields himself for 1.5 seconds, gaining 20  Heat.
levelings:
Enhanced Shield Strength:90 / 142.5 / 195 / 247.5 / 300 (+ 75% AP)
Enhanced Bonus Movement Speed:22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 / 52.5%
descriptions: Active: Rumble  shields himself for 1.5 seconds, gaining 20  Heat.
Rumble also gains  bonus movement speed for the duration.
Danger Zone: Scrap Shield's effects are increased by 50%.

abilities.name: Electro Harpoon
abilities.description: Passive: Rumble periodically stocks an Electro Harpoon charge, up to a maximum of 2.
levelings: Enhanced Magic Damage:»90 / 127.5 / 165 / 202.5 / 240 (+ 60% AP)«Total Enhanced Magic Damage:180 / 255 / 330 / 405 / 480 (+ 120% AP)Enhanced Slow:»22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 / 52.5%«Total Enhanced Slow:45 / 60 / 75 / 90 / 105%
descriptions: Passive: Rumble periodically stocks an Electro Harpoon charge, up to a maximum of 2.

Active: Rumble shoots a harpoon in the target direction, gaining 10  Heat and dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them for 2 seconds. Hitting the same target with another harpoon enhances the  slow, stacking additively.
Danger Zone: Electro Harpoon's effects are increased by 50%.

abilities.name: The Equalizer
abilities.description: Active: Rumble deploys a barrage of rockets along the target path, landing in a line over 1 second and lasting for 5 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage Per Half-Second:»70 / 87.5 / 105 / 122.5 / 140 (+ 17.5% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:840 / 1050 / 1260 / 1470 / 1680 (+ 210% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage Per Half-Second:»70 / 87.5 / 105 / 122.5 / 140 (+ 17.5% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:840 / 1050 / 1260 / 1470 / 1680 (+ 210% AP)
descriptions: Active: Rumble deploys a barrage of rockets along the target path, landing in a line over 1 second and lasting for 5 seconds.
Enemies within the line of rockets take magic damage every 0.5 seconds and are  slowed by 35%. The damage lingers for 1 second after leaving the area or it expires.

name: Rumble
title: the Mechanized Menace
blurb: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff...
